name: Peabhav
greetingText: I wasnt going to do anything because you dont't deserve it
wishText: fk it, it's not going to kill me.. so thanks for memories and enjoy your day  ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you from nibha and me
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But then nibha was too busy for this.
text4: I realised, I wasting my precious time and you're not my friend anymore
text5Content: You were my best friend at some point
outroText: Okay, now go back to drinking unhealthy amount of milk and Happy birthday and enjoy your day
